sn26.5:4.2: “Mendicants, the arising of feeling born of eye contact …
sn26.5:5.1: the arising of feeling born of mind contact …
sn26.5:5.2: is the manifestation of old age and death.
sn26.5:5.3: The cessation of feeling born of eye contact …
sn26.5:5.5: the cessation of feeling born of mind contact … is the ending of old age and death.”
